title: S.T.A.L.K.E.R.: Call of Pripyat - SGM. StalkerMods edition (2.2)
description:
Description from the author: after the release of the initial version of fashion began to appear a lot of assemblies, additions and fixes our portal StalkerMods decided to combine it all and collect one version of fashion + install all fixes and fit fashion "by itself". The result was quite tasty :)

A brief description of the assembly and its difference from others:
* Changed the texture and refined many games
* Because of the pile assemblies made one, a lot of weapons in the game appeared, location and other ...
* Exclusive menu
* Have all the fixes that existed, and those that existed were released and also installed :)
* Some sounds changed
* Many of the description of the weapon replaced
* Many of the costumes also changed description
* Specifications are given in HS real values, but not complicated to madness
* Changed map locations
* Removed many bugs with the characters
* Features weapon physics cartridges, etc. have been modified
* Changed prices




IMPORTANT: 

If when asked to insert the disc, just navigate to the folder with the downloaded games !!!!!!!!!!!!!!!
